fields.description:
1.on a mac running lion, install current appcelerator tools (1.0.2 studio and timob 1.7.2) and current r12 android sdk
2.attempt to install to the device

results: the tab is never recognized and the operation times out.

Notes:using adb itself does not see the tab, Logging for tracking purposes. Same tab works fine on 10.6.8
fields.summary: Mac (lion and 10.6.8)- samsung tabs are not recognized by adb, unable to install to these devices
fields.environment: Lion or 10.6.8, studio 1.0.2, timob 1.7.2, galaxy 7 inch (2.3.4) and galaxy tab 10 inch (3.1)

comments.body: I tested on a Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 not only did it show up in adb, but I could build an app using Titanium SDK 3.1.1.GA and it installed and ran just fine.
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
